001package edu.cnm.deepdive.chat.controller;
002
003import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
004import org.springframework.http.HttpStatus;
005import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.ExceptionHandler;
006import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.ResponseStatus;
007import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestControllerAdvice;
008
009@RestControllerAdvice
010public class ExceptionMapping {
011
012  @ExceptionHandler(NoSuchElementException.class)
013  @ResponseStatus(value = HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND, reason = "Specified channel does not exist")
014  public void channelNotFound() {
015  }
016
017  @ExceptionHandler(IllegalArgumentException.class)
018  @ResponseStatus(value = HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST, reason = "Invalid request data")
019  public void invalidRequest() {
020  }
021
022  @ExceptionHandler(IllegalStateException.class)
023  @ResponseStatus(value = HttpStatus.CONFLICT, reason = "Game over!")
024  public void gameOver() {
025  }
026
027}
